Socratic Seminar 129

26 Oct 2023 Link to Meetup

Announcements

Please join us for our next Socratic Seminar. A special thank you to our sponsors CardCoins, Chaincode Labs and Wolf NYC for food, refreshments and event space.

If you can’t make it to the main event please join us at PUBKEY around 9:30PM.

Presentation

  • Dan Gould: Payjoin v2: Oblivious, Serverless, Asynchronous Batching

Pull Requests and repo updates

Bitcoin Core

  • wallet: Reload watchonly and solvables wallets after migration
  • Make miniscript GetWitnessSize accurate for tapscript
  • assumeutxo: fail early if snapshot block hash doesn’t match AssumeUTXO parameters
  • lib: add taproot support to libconsensus
  • Implement CCoinsViewErrorCatcher::HaveCoin and check disk space periodically
  • rpc: add hidden getrawaddrman RPC to list addrman table entries
  • descriptors: Disallow hybrid and uncompressed keys when inferring
  • AssumeUTXO follow-ups
  • rpc: allow submitpackage to be called outside of regtest
  • BIP324 integration
  • assumeutxo (2)
  • MiniTapscript: port Miniscript to Tapscript
  • descriptors: disallow hybrid public keys
  • Add headerssync tuning parameters optimization script to repo
  • net: raise V1_PREFIX_LEN from 12 to 16
  • http: bugfix: allow server shutdown in case of remote client disconnection
  • net: Drop v2 garbage authentication packet
  • Add package evaluation fuzzer

BDK

  • Add bitcoind_rpc chain source module.

rust-bitcoin

  • Upgrade secp dependency
  • Update bech32 dependency
  • Audit error types code base wide
  • Feature: Psbt fee checks
  • Re-write the weight/size API
  • Add Witness::p2wpkh constructor

Core Lightning

  • Restore any missing psbt metadata that resource constrained signers strip
  • Simplify use of channel_update
  • Plugin and broadcast cleanups
  • Allow even unknown messages, by registration, and allow sending them
  • addpsbtoutput: New onchain command for PSBT output and splice_out tests
  • runes: Reimplement rate in terms of per

eclair

  • Ignore disabled edges for routing messages
  • Adapt max HTLC amount to balance
  • Simplify dual-funded min-depth calculation
  • Strip witness of interactive tx parents
  • Add metrics on splicing
  • Handle splice with local/remote index mismatch
  • Poll bitcoind at startup instead of trying only once
  • Remove ChannelFeatures->ChannelType conversion
  • Assume widely supported features
  • Splice with pending committed htlcs
  • Improve startup resource usage
  • Allow splicing on non dual-funded channels
  • Fix tests that expect network minimum feerate to be less than other rates

LDK

  • BOLT 12 Offers message flow
  • Monitor updating persister
  • BOLT 12 Offers utilities
  • Set a default max_total_routing_fee_msat of 1% + 50sats
  • Try to overpay the recipient if we fail to find a path at all and limit overpay #2604
  • Use correct to_remote script in counterparty commitments
  • Allow retrieval of SpendableOutputDescriptors from relevant transactions
  • More flexible fee rate estimates

lnd

  • multi: pong enforcement
  • invoices: refactor InvoiceDB to eliminate ScanInvoices
  • Add more information when a co-op close is failing.
  • input+sweep: make sure input with no fee rate is not added to cluster
  • sweeper: relax anchor sweeping when there’s no deadline pressure
  • tlv: fuzz test encoding/decoding
  • funding: wait for coinbase maturity before sending channel_ready
  • lnwallet+rpcserver: fix weight calculation for taproot channels
  • peer: launch persistent peer pruning in background goroutine
  • chanacceptor+lnrpc: add simple taproot channel support
